sub_title: Ex-CTO @ ApexQubit, Grok / Alumni @ EF, CDL, HealthInc / Advisor @ AgileRL
summary:
Engineering Director in Deep Learning and Life Sciences R&D. I have been into LLMs and Generative Modeling since 2017. 

I am an architect (intense INTJ) living in the world of abstract ideas, thriving in design of systems and strategies, bridging humanities and sciences. I am a polymath devoting my existence to unveiling the arcana of our universe and intelligence, solving the most perplex conundrums of mankind. I am an alumni of Entrepreneur First (backed by Reid Hoffman and Demis Hassabis), HealthInc (Startupbootcamp spin-off), Creative Destruction Lab (working with Xanadu, D-wave and Google X) and Nvidia, Google and AWS for Startups. Top200 of 67M playing League of Legends at the age 16 (3000 elo). Ideal physics SAT at 18. The youngest EF CTO at 21. At 23 led a team of 15 bringing 75M Series A. At 24 aced System Design and Behavioral interviews for Staff MLE (L6) at Meta UK during mass layoffs.  

I consider myself a collectioner, collecting luscious minds and ardent knowledge as would folklore’s Liches collect forbidden spells and artifacts with ecumenical significance. When I was a child I sought clarity of a mind with zeal and ardor blinding me to colourful aspects of the world. That path had led me to conquering abstractness of thought so-desired by scholars, but cast me away from reality in its practicalities and, what’s worse, its heart. Soon I have recognized my malaise in its apathy to everything but abstract mechanisms and begun the quest to reconstruct my own wit.

projects.title: NEC Hackaton (Winner): Fetish Analysis Proposal
projects.description:
We have produced an engine for ranging dating partners depending on personal preferences in appearance based on Deep Neural Encoders
(Vector Representations of Images), Gradient Boosting (Ranging Users) and Gaussian Mixture model (Clustering Preferences).

profile_positions.description: Reinventing Subsidiary Enterprise (1.3K+ People) for Automated Health Insurance Document Processing (Largest in Germany).
profile_positions.title: Principal Machine Learning Architect

profile_positions.description:
Engineering Management and Sales in Machine Learning Solutions (Increased Conversion Rate from 5% to 12%):

Organization Design (75+ people) of ML Solutions Department: Standardized Hiring, Restructured Roles, Optimized Sales, Defined Strategy.

Presales and Business Development via SWOT Analysis, Prioritizing Markets, Consulting Clients and Prototyping Solutions (3M+ in Sales).

Designed and Estimated Scalable Machine Learning Systems for Healthcare, Pharmaceuticals, Manufacturing and Finances (100+ customers).
profile_positions.title: Principal Machine Learning Architect (Director)

profile_positions.description:
Technical Management in Machine Learning R&D (Our Work Led to 75M Investment Series A):

Hired and Co-lead R&D teams (40+ people) on Drug Target Identification: Learning Explainable Representations from LLMs and Graph Models.

Educated and Mentored (30+ people) on Machine Learning System Design Growing Senior Engineers into Leadership or Architecture Positions.

Built a Platform Recognizing Clinical Patterns in Patients EHRs (UKBB, PPMI, ...) and Identifying Genetic Circuits Driving Autoimmune Diseases.
profile_positions.title: Principal Machine Learning Scientist (Senior Manager)

profile_positions.description:
Computational Drug Design based on Hybrid Quantum-Classical Machine Learning (Valuated 10M at Series A):

Fundraising and Ideation with Accelerators (HealthInc, CDL) and Corporations (Nvidia, Google, Amazon) (120K cash and 1M+ services).

Business Development within Industry and Academia (Merck, Bayer, Novartis, Schrodinger, D-wave, Xanadu, IMTM Czech and Google X).

Hired and Lead R&D teams (20+ people) on Computational Drug Design: Protein Folding, Ligand Generation and Binding Prediction.

Reimplemented SOTA Machine Learning Solutions for Computational Drug Design: GENTRL, DeepDTA, AtomNet, DeepAtom, ADMET Predictors.

Developed SOTA Solution for Optimization of Molecular Properties (Affinity and Solubility) based on GANs, RL and Point-Voxel CNNs.

Pure Research on Injecting Quantum Layers into Classical GANs (as per QuGAN): Reduced the Number of Parameters by 95% on MNIST.
